mapper.select: select count(user_id) from users where authority = #{authority};

SELECT USER_ID as userId ,ACCOUNT_ID as accountId ,ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName ,EMAIL ,CREATED_DATE as createDate ,GENDER FROM users where authority = 'ROLE_USER' order by ${sortingColumn} ${requestOrder} limit #{contentPerPage} offset #{pageStart}

SELECT USER_ID as userId ,ACCOUNT_ID as accountId ,ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName ,EMAIL ,CREATED_DATE as createDate ,GENDER FROM users where authority = 'ROLE_ADMIN' order by ${sortingColumn} ${requestOrder} limit #{contentPerPage} offset #{pageStart}

select count(case when age BETWEEN 10 and 19 then 1 end) as "age10s", count(case when age BETWEEN 20 and 29 then 1 end) as "age20s", count(case when age BETWEEN 30 and 39 then 1 end) as "age30s", count(case when age BETWEEN 40 and 49 then 1 end) as "age40s", count(case when age BETWEEN 50 and 59 then 1 end) as "age50s", count(case when age > 60 then 1 end) as "ageOver60s", count(age) as "ageTotal" from (select date_format(now(), '%Y' )-date_format(birthdate, '%Y')+1 as age from users) T

select count(case when gender = 'M' then 1 end) as "male", count(case when gender = 'F' then 1 end) as "female", count(case when gender = 'U' then 1 end) as "unknown", count(case when (gender = 'M' or gender = 'F' or gender = 'U') then 1 end) as "genderTotal" from users

select count(case when address = '서울' then 1 end) as "seoul", count(case when address = '부산' then 1 end) as "busan", count(case when address = '대구' then 1 end) as "daegu", count(case when address = '인천' then 1 end) as "incheon", count(case when address = '광주' then 1 end) as "gwangju", count(case when address = '대전' then 1 end) as "daejeon", count(case when address = '울산' then 1 end) as "ulsan", count(case when address = '세종' then 1 end) as "sejong", count(case when address = '경기' then 1 end) as "gyeonggi", count(case when address = '강원' then 1 end) as "gangwon", count(case when address = '충청' then 1 end) as "chungcheong", count(case when address = '전라' then 1 end) as "junra", count(case when address = '경상' then 1 end) as "gyeongsang", count(case when address = '제주' then 1 end) as "jeju", count(address) as "addressTotal" from (select substr(address,1,2) as address from users) T

select count(case when join_month = '01' then 1 end) as "Jan", count(case when join_month = '02' then 1 end) as "Feb", count(case when join_month = '03' then 1 end) as "Mar", count(case when join_month = '04' then 1 end) as "Apr", count(case when join_month = '05' then 1 end) as "May", count(case when join_month = '06' then 1 end) as "Jun", count(case when join_month = '07' then 1 end) as "Jul", count(case when join_month = '08' then 1 end) as "Aug", count(case when join_month = '09' then 1 end) as "Sep", count(case when join_month = '10' then 1 end) as "Oct", count(case when join_month = '11' then 1 end) as "Nov", count(case when join_month = '12' then 1 end) as "Dec" from (select substr(created_date,6,2) as join_month from users) T
